ResourceHeader.Description:
The Hinode EUV Imaging Spectrometer simultaneously
measures in the 170-210 and 250-290 Angstrom ranges using two
large back-illuminated CCDs.  EIS utilizes an off-axis parabolic primary 
and a toroidal diffraction grating in a normal-incidence optical layout.

InformationURL.Name: NAOJ Hinode site
InformationURL.Description:
National Astronomical Observatory of Japan web site 
for Hinode mission, instruments, etc.
